msg: Bugzilla 31447 and 31499: added bin/contrib directory with contributed scripts for other operating systems.

author: luehe
msg: Prevent NPE when servlet class is not an instance of HttpServlet.
Return hardcoded set of methods in this case.

author: luehe
msg: If TRACE has been disabled, return appropriate error code
(405, instead of the current 403) and include Allow header in response, in
order to comply with HTTP 1.1 spec:
The method specified in the Request-Line is not allowed for the
resource identified by the Request-URI. The response MUST include an
Allow header containing a list of valid methods for the requested

author: yoavs
msg: Bugzilla 31656: make admin webapp build with Struts 1.2.

msg: Added doc and better exception handling to Bugzilla 31592 impl.
